snippet.title: Forge Industry - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist our game now on Steam: http://wishlist.forge-industry.com/

Take on the role as the fantasy blacksmith of your dreams in this resource management and automation game. Automate your workshop, upgrade your stations, craft legendary weapons, and win the heart of the princess! 

Releases June 30th on Steam, with a playable demo during Steam Next Fest (June 19th - 26th). 

Curious in the making of this trailer? https://youtu.be/B9u_JVLTTBE
